description: STRING No. 8 // From 2016-03-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // Jensen painted ‘Rooks’ while teaching at Krabbesholm in Skive. From his forest house he could hear the rooks return to the trees in the evening just before dusk.
name: Rooks I/IV
